meta.title: About | [Name] Photography - Professional Photographer
meta.description: Discover the vision behind the lens. Learn about our journey, editorial style, and commitment to capturing life's most significant moments.

AboutPage.title: Capturing the Essence of Life
AboutPage.intro: I am [Name], a professional photographer dedicated to the art of visual storytelling. For years, I've been helping clients preserve their most cherished memories through high-end photography.
AboutPage.description: Specializing in luxury weddings and editorial portraits, my style is a sophisticated blend of timeless elegance and modern reportage.

1.q: How can I book a session?
1.a: You can write to me via the contact form. I will reply within 24 hours to discuss the details and confirm the date.

2.q: How long will it take to receive the photos?
2.a: Delivery times vary by service. You will receive a link to a private gallery once the editing is complete.

3.q: Do you also work outside the city?
3.a: Yes, I am available for travel. Travel costs will be agreed upon based on the distance.
